page.title: 18Burscough-Leisure Survey
page.content:
Some pupils at Priory High School were asked about how they spend their leisure time and these were the results:- AVERAGE TIME PER WEEK SPENT:- Watching T.V. 11.75hours Homework 7.5 hours Reading 4.75hours Sport 1.5 hours
Other less popular activities included:- listening to music,playing the piano,helping at Brownies,going to Church,Young Farmers Club,Air Training Corps,visiting friends.
A survey of parents leisure time gave the following results:- swimming baths, shopping,pubs,Burscough Sports Centre, sewing,darts,cordon bleu cooking,making beer , playing squash,football and watching T.V.
